patterns: Can you give some information about this website?
responses: This website is an implementation of the Tango with Django Book. For more info, visit my dev's github page at here

patterns: What are the features of this website?
Tell some features of this website?
Can you tell me some features of this website?
responses: Images, user login facility, profile view, useful links and myself, Mr. Sam, the chatbot :)

patterns: How is the front end implemented?
responses: The frontend is made of HTML and Javascript which is dynamically rendered by Django.

patterns: What framework was used to make this website?
responses: The framework used here is Django, which is built upon Python language. It allows us build enterprise level websites.
The backend uses Django-redux for authentication and an SQLite database to store data about useful pages and users.

patterns: Give me the developer's contact information
responses: This website was developed by Tejas Hegde. His email is 1001.tejas@gmail.com. GitHub Link:
The website is deployed in pythonanywhere.com.

patterns: What's the purpose of this website?
Tell the purpose of this website
responses: The developer built this website during his vacation to gain knowledge about web development.

patterns: Tell me why pythonanywhere was chosen
responses: pythonanywhere.com offers a generous free tier which made it possible for the dev to deploy the website FOR FREE 24/7.
